title: Honoring Mrs. Patty Yarmel upon the occasion of her designation for special recognition for her volunteer efforts at the Dr. Charles T. Lunsford School 19
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Mrs. Patty Yarmel upon the occasion of
her designation for special recognition for her volunteer efforts at the
Dr. Charles T. Lunsford School 19

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that  the
quality  and  character of life in the communities across New York State
are enhanced by the concerned and dedicated efforts of individuals  that
generously contribute to the welfare of the community and its citizenry;
and
  WHEREAS, It is also the custom of this Legislative Body to acknowledge
outstanding individuals whose professional lives, personal endeavors and
community  service  are  an example and inspiration to their colleagues,
friends, and family; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Mrs.
Patty  Yarmel  upon the occasion of her designation for special recogni-
tion for her volunteer efforts at the Dr. Charles T. Lunsford School 19;
and
  WHEREAS, In 2008, Mrs. Patty Yarmel  performed  outstanding  volunteer
services  at  the  Dr.  Charles  T. Lunsford School 19 with a desire and
vision to develop a violin program; she also volunteers  two  days  plus
per week to teach and work with the students; and
  WHEREAS, In the first year of Mrs. Patty Yarmel's volunteer efforts at
the school, it received more than 30 violin donations from people in the
community; and
  WHEREAS, Through these volunteer efforts of Mrs. Patty Yarmel, the Dr.
Charles  T.  Lunsford  School  19  has a relationship with the Rochester
Philharmonic Youth Orchestra (RYPO)  so  that  violins  donated  to  the
school are done directly through RYPO; and
  WHEREAS,  As a result of volunteer efforts and other initiatives, RYPO
helped to build student interest in  the  music  program  by  performing
monthly  chamber music concerts for the K-3 grades, and by year-end 2009
the program had achieved exceptional growth; and
  WHEREAS, The music program at the Dr. Charles T.  Lunsford  School  19
has  had an outstanding effect on its students and on the community; the
program has been featured at the Side  by  Side  RYPO/RPO  concert,  the
Rochester Lilac Festival, and the International Jazz Festival; and
  WHEREAS,  In  addition,  the  students in the music program at the Dr.
Charles T. Lunsford School 19 have been honored as guest  performers  at
Kilbourne  Hall/Eastman  Theatre  for  the  William Warfield Scholarship
Recital and at the Strong Museum of Play for the Center of Youth  Annual
Board meeting; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period of her professional and communi-
ty  service, a period of constructive involvement, Mrs. Patty Yarmel has
stood constant in dignity, good grace and  humor,  and  has  earned  the
respect and admiration of her colleagues, family and friends; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual  for  the  benefit  of  others which Mrs. Patty Yarmel has displayed
throughout her life; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be recognized by all the citizens of this great Empire
State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Mrs. Patty Yarmel upon the occasion of her designation for special
recognition  for  her  volunteer  efforts at the Dr. Charles T. Lunsford
School 19; and be it further

  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Mrs. Patty Yarmel.
